sentences.sContent: Ok so it goes against the grain to spend £20 on moisturiser when you have saddle soap and an old packet of lard in the cupboard, but buy it you must.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ok so it goes against the grain to spend £20 on moisturiser when you have saddle soap and an old packet of lard in the cupboard, but buy it you must.
sentences.sCn: 这样做就像当你的柜橱中只有脊肉汤和一袋旧猪油时你却花费20英镑去买保湿霜一样不合常情，你必须得放弃这样的想法。

phrases.pCn: 猪油；精制猪油（由猪油提炼出来的油，供作滑润油及灯油之用）

trans.tranOther: white fat from pigs that is used in cooking
